title.narrative: Lake Chad Region Recovery and Development Project

description.narrative: Contribute to the recovery of the Lake Chad Region through supporting regional coordinating and crisis monitoring, connectivity and agricultural livelihoods in selected provinces of the Republic of Cameroon, Republic of Chad and Republic of Niger (Participating Countries)

participating-org.narrative: Executive Secretariat for the SDS Sahel Niger (SE/SDS Sahel-Niger)

condition.narrative: Not later than November 30 in each calendar year (or one (1) month after the Effective Date for the first year of Projectimplementation), the Recipient shall prepare and furnish to the Association a draft annual work plan and budget for the Project forthe subsequent calendar year of Project implementation, of such scope and detail as the Association shall have reasonablyrequested.
